---
title: Ligamentum nuchae
---


The Nuchal ligament serves as an attachment for the [upper trapezius]({{< var ref-upper-trapezius.path >}}), [splenius capitis]({{< var ref-splenius-capitis.path >}}), and [splenius cervicis]({{< var ref-splenius-cervicis.path >}}) @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.
